EmailTemplate.name: Case_Email Address Closure Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Email Address Closure Notice {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace, we have received your request and you will receive a case number for this request in a separate email. In our effort to streamline and improve our responsiveness time to you, we will be closing this email address September 30, 2011, and ask that you send future requests to one of the following email addresses.
orders@honeywell.com orderchanges@honeywell.com quotes@honeywell.com orderstatus@honeywell.com spex-bgaOrders@honeywell.com returns@honeywell.com aog@honeywell.com
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace Contact Team
